content: Locking nut stainless steel Locking nut for installation with HAS-U anchor rods under fatigue loading ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- ### FEATURES:Features Easier handling, even with multiple fastening points Available in sizes M8 - M12 Installation possible as pre-fastening or through-fastening Applications Fatigue loading applications with HAS-U anchor rods according to ETA-23/0277 For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Stainless steel, A4 Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Stainless steel, A4 ### ITEMS
